tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE materials_orders (
    order_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    material_id UUID,
    order_quantity INT,
    order_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (material_id) REFERENCES materials_inventory(material_id)
);

CREATE TABLE shipments (
    shipment_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    material_id INT REFERENCES materials(material_id),
    supplier_id INT REFERENCES suppliers(supplier_id),
    shipment_date DATE,
    quantity_shipped INT
);

CREATE TABLE materials (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    material_name VARCHAR(255),
    quantity INT,
    reorder_point INT
)

CREATE TABLE suppliers (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    supplier_name VARCHAR(255),
    contact_person VARCHAR(255),
    email VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE shipments (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    material_id INT,
    supplier_id INT,
    quantity_shipped INT,
    shipment_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE inventory_logs (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    material_id INT,
    quantity_change INT,
    event_type VARCHAR(255),
    event_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE raw_materials (
  material_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  material_name TEXT NOT NULL,
  quantity_on_hand INT,
  reorder_point INT
)

CREATE TABLE suppliers (
  supplier_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  supplier_name TEXT NOT NULL,
  contact_person TEXT,
  phone_number TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE shipments (
  shipment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  material_id INT REFERENCES raw_materials(material_id),
  supplier_id INT REFERENCES suppliers(supplier_id),
  shipment_date DATE,
  quantity_shipped INT
)

CREATE TABLE inventory_logs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  material_id INT REFERENCES raw_materials(material_id),
  log_date DATE,
  action TEXT,
  quantity_changed INT
)

CREATE TABLE reorder_history (
  reorder_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  material_id INT REFERENCES raw_materials(material_id),
  reorder_date DATE,
  previous_quantity INT,
  new_quantity INT
)
